As times have now changed and the focus in now on family living, you will be impressed by the renovations that have taken place so far on this wonderful home on a land size of 865m2 approx.

Accommodation is provided by the 3 bedrooms with built in robes, the Master Bedroom with full ensuite and bedrooms 2 and 3 serviced with the second bathroom.

With bus service, schools, sporting facilities and shops not far away your family's needs are well catered for.

Celebrates period warmth and modern comfort.
There are some homes that simply steal your heart and 158 Eastfield Road is certainly no exception.
Peacefully tucked away behind a tall picket fence, it all begins with a charming weatherboard exterior, complemented by an attractive return verandah and meticulously landscaped garden. Once inside, original character details are perfectly weaved into the highly-functional, single-level layout. A combination of polished floorboards, high ceiling, picture rails, decorative cornices and sash windows evoke a sense of the past.
The lounge is comfortable and relaxing, featuring a large window that offers garden sightlines while also attracting natural light into the interior. The home also comprises a rumpus room, allowing the family space to move. From here, step outside to a covered deck which is flanked by two additional decks and leads down to a paved sitting area. The series of living options offers a perfect mix of indoor and outdoor living.
The country-style kitchen complements the overall feel of the home. Comprising a gas oven and stove, everyday convenience is yours with benefits that include a dishwasher, corner pantry and servery. The use of timber throughout the home adds a sense of warmth, including timber benchtops in the kitchen while the adjoining dining is perfectly positioned for relaxed meals and special events.
Three bedrooms provide ample room for the family, including the master which is fitted with a walk-in robe and a beautifully renovated ensuite showcasing a contemporary flare; boasting a rain shower, stone-topped vanity and large format tiles. The additional bedrooms share the stunning luxury bathroom, fully refurbished to include a rain shower over a deep-soak bath, twin vanity and large format floor-to-wall tiles.
Conveniently positioned, the home also features a study nook with built-in desk and cupboard while other notable inclusions list as; serviceable laundry with timber benchtop and ample cupboard space, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, split system air-conditioning and wood heater in the rumpus room, ceiling fans throughout, double blinds, generous storage, cubby, veggie patch, lemon tree, security alarm system, water tank and abundant off-street parking. Side and front gates create a safe space for children and pets to play.
Another remarkable benefit of the home is the lined and carpeted bungalow. It's perfect for a variety of uses, including; games room, studio, home office/business or gym. The additional storage area with sink and adjoining ensuite also creates the opportunity to utilise the space as a fourth/guest bedroom. The tradesperson could also take advantage of this great space.
Set on a sizable 868m2 (approx.) block, this home is situated just a short stroll from Eastfield Park with barbeque area and playground, the local bus stop, horse and pony club, Tarralla Creek, The Mall shopping strip, Pinjarra Kindergarten, Dorset Primary School, Merrindale Shopping Centre, as well as being in close reach of Tinternvale Primary School, Tintern Grammar, Croydon Railway Station, EastLink freeway and Croydon Memorial Pool.
Come and see for yourself why all who visit, fall in love with this home.
